name: Deep Voyage (itch)
description:
Story based walking simulator based on the journey to the center of the Earth by jules Verne. 

The game was developed during the Epic mega Jam 2019. 

The static meshes, textures and materials are not made by me. They were gathered from various sources such as sketchfab and the Epic Games store. All contributions and credits can be found in the game. 

Audio from Soundly.
